control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Identifies, reports, and corrects information system flaws;b. Tests software and firmware updates related to flaw remediation for effectiveness and potential side effects before installation;c. Installs security-relevant software and firmware updates within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of the release of the updates; andd. Incorporates flaw remediation into the organizational configuration management process
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization removes [Assignment: organization-defined software and firmware components] after updated versions have been installed.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Identifies, reports, and corrects information system flaws;b. Tests software and firmware updates related to flaw remediation for effectiveness and potential side effects before installation;c. Installs security-relevant software and firmware updates within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of the release of the updates; andd. Incorporates flaw remediation into the organizational configuration management process
